rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance leading to the living areas and garage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space with a Scandinavian minimalist design, featuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for dining and informal gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into a Scandinavian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated space with built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating, and ample lighting.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet workspace designed for productivity with a Scandinavian modern design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with private balcony and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact and cozy guest bedroom with a balcony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
